11 class a3_help::RequestGoal{
12 
13  public:
14  // Accessable methods and variables to all classes, not just member

16 
17  // The request to the service request_goal is declared as this struct.
18  //
19  struct Request{
20 
21  // The robot moves in the x,y plane and around the z-axis(this angle
22  // is aka yaw).
23  //
24  // All these members define the robot 'goal', or goto pose, required
25  // for the next move.
26  //
27  // Pose = Position and Orientation.
28  //
29  double x; // postion of robot along x-axis in metres
30  double y; // postion of robot along y-axis in metres
31  double angle; // angle/yaw in radians, the robot is rotated about
32  // the z-axis at this angle
33  double scanTime; // how often the request_goal service is called,
34  // ie how often the requestGoal() callback fn is called
35 
36  };
37 
38  // The responce to the service request_goal is declared as this struct.
39  //
40  struct Response{
41 
42  bool ack; // true=> robot move succeeded, ie requestGoal() returns true
43  // false=> robot move failed, requestGoal() returns false
44 
45  };
46

49  // a3_help::RequestGoal::Response &res);
50  bool RequestGoal(Request &req, Response &res);
51

53  // Available to this base class and derived classes.
54  // available to derived classes
55 
56  // works but we know where in this class, so unecssary.
